mysteryDungeon:ExplorersDeck.NAME: Explorer's deck
mysteryDungeon:ExplorersDeck.DESCRIPTION: Will become a deck of 5 cards once you choose your explorer.

mysteryDungeon:PartnersDeck.NAME: Partner's Deck
mysteryDungeon:PartnersDeck.DESCRIPTION: Will become a deck of 5 cards once you choose your partner.

mysteryDungeon:ColorlessAgility.NAME: Agility
mysteryDungeon:ColorlessAgility.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:ChooseAttack.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:ChooseSkill.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Skill to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurBulletSeed.NAME: Bullet Seed

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurChlorophyll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each Attack drawn this way, gain 1 Strength.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurExplorerForm.NAME: Explorer Form

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurFrenzyPlant.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply 2 Poison !M! times. NL You cannot heal during this turn.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurIngrain.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 mysterydungeon:Leech_Seed to a random enemy !M! times. NL Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurProtect.NAME: Protect
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurProtect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You cannot gain Block from cards during the next !M! turns.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleScald.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !mysteryDungeon:M2! cards. Deal !D! damage and apply !M! mysterydungeon:Burn per card discarded that way.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleShellSmash.NAME: Shell Smash
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleShellSmash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Shuffle !mysteryDungeon:M2! *Freeze into your draw pile.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashGo.NAME: Skull Bash Go!
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashGo.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this is the leftmost card of your hand, deal another !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashGo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this is the leftmost card of your hand, deal another !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashReady.NAME: Skull Bash: Ready!
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashReady.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Skull *Bash: *Set in your draw pile.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashReady.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Shuffle a *Skull *Bash: *Set in your draw pile.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashSet.NAME: Skull Bash: Set!
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashSet.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a *Skull *Bash: *Go! into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashSet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Skull *Bash: *Go! into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSubstitute.NAME: Substitute
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSubstitute.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile. NL Add it to your hand and put a *Wound where the card was. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSubstitute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile. NL Add a copy of that card to your hand and put a *Wound at the card's location. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleTorrent.NAME: Torrent
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleTorrent.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWaterSpout.NAME: Water Spout
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWaterSpout.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M! card. NL Apply !mysteryDungeon:M2! Weak. NL Deal !D! damage.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWaterSpout.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry !M! cards. NL Apply !mysteryDungeon:M2! Weak. NL Deal !D! damage.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWhirlpool.NAME: Whirlpool
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWhirlpool.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your X next turns, draw 2 more cards and discard 2 cards. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWhirlpool.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your X+1 next turns, draw 2 more cards and discard 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWithdraw.NAME: Withdraw
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWithdraw.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck. NL Gain !M! Block per card in hand.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleZenHeadbutt.NAME: Zen Headbutt

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleZenHeadbutt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Create an upgraded *Flinch and add it to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:TotodileConfide.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable. NL Your next attack deals !mysteryDungeon:M2! additional damage. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:TotodileCrunch.NAME: Crunch
mysteryDungeon:TotodileCrunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:TotodileHail.NAME: Hail

mysteryDungeon:TotodileHail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL mysterydungeon:Scoop-up NL When discarded: Channel !M! Frost.

mysteryDungeon:TotodileIcePunch.NAME: Ice Punch

mysteryDungeon:TotodileIcyWind.DESCRIPTION: Inert. NL Channel !M! Frost. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:TotodileSheerForce.NAME: Sheer Force
mysteryDungeon:TotodileSheerForce.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal !M! or more unblocked damage, channel 1 Frost.

mysteryDungeon:TotodileRainDance.NAME: Rain Dance
mysteryDungeon:TotodileRainDance.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When discarded: Your next attack deals !M! additional damage.
mysteryDungeon:TotodileRainDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL mysterydungeon:Scoop-up NL When discarded: Your next attack deals !M! additional damage.
